## Grid.execute() method

Executes actions on grid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
execute(...actions: GridAction[]): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  actions | <code>GridAction[]</code> | Array of actions that are executed over grid |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
